price: 47 Mais ils accueillirent les miracles qu’il produisit sous leurs yeux en les tournant en dérision.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahum biāyātinā idhā hum min'hā yaḍḥakūna
